Document:
#Praetorian, Tier 3
##Playing as a Praetorian
Base Praetorian is similar to an upgraded Spitter, specializing in consistent ranged attacks and having a dash ability. They can sync up multiple abilities to deal bursts of damage from around corners such as Acid Spit and Acid Ball.
Its passive grants acid-based attacks a stack of acid to targets. Once they reach 5 stacks they will take additional burn damage and sizzle. These stacks can be easily reached by stacking multiple abilities on the same target.
Recommended to play around corners and quickly disperse burst attacks. Use your range to your advantage to pressure the hosts.
##Abilities: - [bold][color=green]PASSIVE[/color][/bold]: Acid attacks apply a stack of acid to target. If 5 stacks are reached on a single target then they will take additional burn damage. - [bold][color=green]PASSIVE[/color][/bold]: Acid spits grant shield upon hit. - [bold]Acid Spit[/bold]: Glob acid to deal damage to any targets and grants shield upon hit.
- [bold]Dash[/bold]: Dash a short distance.
- [bold]Spray Acid[/bold]: Sprays acid along the ground in a line, covering any barricades and dealing damage to hosts, additionally applying a stack of acid to them. - Will also extinguish any sisters if they are on fire.
- [bold]Corrosive Acid[/bold]: Secretes a glob of acid on items to be dissolved.
